job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: strongRemoteIoT EquitybrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Dylan CurrierbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 140000  180000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongWe are an early stage startup in the Bay Area that is utilizing machine data to deliver critical information We make sure people are safe by taking advantage of IoT and sensor data Our goal is to help improve lives and make sure that everyone is safe at all timesbrbrAs a member of our team your work will be at a global presence impacting the lives of millions We are looking for someone who is excited about making a global impact at scalebrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongWe are a fast growing startup and have a strong engineering presence here in Silicon Valley We have executives who have worked at top tech companies and attended top universitiesbrbrWe offer a generous amount of equity and pay competitive salariesbrbrstrongJob DetailsbrstrongulliYou will be owning both our on prem and cloud infrastructureliliYou will be implementing end to end infra automation liliYou will be automating everything and anythingliliYou will be using cutting edge technologies such as Ansible Terraform Kubernetes and DockerbrliulInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonbrbr
